T02n2963u_001:1: dānaṁ gomayamambunā ca sahitaṁ śīlaṁ ca saṁmārjanam śānti-kṣudra-pippalikā panayanaṁ vīryaṁ kriyāpasthāpanam |
T02n2963u_001:2: dhyānaṁ tatkṣaṇamekacittakaraṇaṁ prajñā surekhojjvalā etāḥ pāramitāḥ ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam | 1 |
T02n2963u_001:6: ṣaṭpāramitāpūraṇena vinā na buddhatvaṁ siddhatvaṁ ca bhavati |
T02n2963u_001:8: uktaṁ ca bhagavatā yasminpakṣe - na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo na maṇḍaleyaṁ na ca maṇḍalaṁ ca |
T02n2963u_001:9: sa mantrajāpaḥ sa japaḥ sa homaḥ tanmaṇḍaleyaṁ tanmaṇḍalaṁ ca ||
T02n2963u_001:13: punarapyuktam - na buddho labhyate'nyatra lokadhātuṣu kutracit |
T02n2963u_001:14: cittameva hi saṁbuddho na buddho'nyatra darśitaḥ ||
T02n2963u_001:17: cittaṁ śuddhyati niyataṁ tāvadācaret ityadikaṁ, na vande( t )
T02n2963u_001:20: dhīmān devān na tad vandet kāṣṭhapāṣāṇamṛṇmayān |
T02n2963u_001:43: kiṁ falaṁ atha cet tatrāpi pāramitā trividhā smṛtā |
T02n2963u_001:50: uktaṁ ca hevajre- śarīraṁ dānaṁ datvā tu paścāccaryāṁ samārabhet |
T02n2963u_001:57: nirālaṁbinyāḥ pāramitāpakṣaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṁ dānaṁ saṁjñādīnāṁ kiṁ dānaṁ iti |
T02n2963u_001:61: atha dīyate vā cāṇḍālikāṁ pañcagatikāṁ poṣaṇaṁ bodhicittadānaṁ etaddānaṁ iti |
T02n2963u_001:66: atha go avadhūtī nāḍīgāminīti tena dvāreṇa pariṇāmayatītyarthaḥ |
T02n2963u_001:67: ambunā ca śītāṁśudhāradravaṁ mahāsukhacakrasthaṁ tenāmbunā sahitaṁ yugmam |
T02n2963u_001:68: sahamarṣaṇe ekīkṛtaṁ cāṇḍālyā saha śaśirūpatvena saṁmiśrī bhūtam |
T02n2963u_001:69: uktaṁ ca śrīhevajre- nābhau dahati caṇḍālī dahati pañcatathāgatān |
T02n2963u_001:70: dahati ca locanādīḥ dagdhehaṁ sravate śaśī |
T02n2963u_001:73: kiṁ tat śīlaṁ śīlasamādhau samādhi samidhi ekacittakaraṇamityarthaḥ |
T02n2963u_001:75: sato vastuno mārjanaṁ sṛjo śuddho sato ( sajo )
T02n2963u_001:79: saha saṁyoge śūnyatāḥ karūṇā cekatā sukṣāntiḥ |
T02n2963u_001:82: kṣudraṁ bodhicittaṁ ca kṣudramamṛtaṁ śuddhā iti nyāyāt |
T02n2963u_001:88: pipīlikā nāḍī lalanā tayā apanayanaṁ kṣudrapipīlikāpanayanaṁ bodhicittamāsvādanamityarthaḥ |
T02n2963u_001:90: anuttarasamyaksaṁbodhigata cittasvabhāvakaṁ lalanā prajñāsvarūpaṁ ca bodhicittamupāyakam |
T02n2963u_001:96: kriyāhetudharmā yeṣu dharmadhātusvarūpāḥ tasyāḥ tantrārabhyamāṇamiti kriyā upasthānaṁ samīkaraṇaṁ sādaranirantrakālaṁ mārgābhyāsāt |
T02n2963u_001:104: prajñāsurekhojjvalā śobhanarekhā surekhā vidyutchaṭākāreṇa yā rekhā |
T02n2963u_001:105: sā bhagavatī caṇḍālī nābhimaṇḍalasthitā sā bhagavatī mahāmudrā parikalpitā |
T02n2963u_001:108: adhimātrasattvānāṁ prajñāpāramitā-pūraṇena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ pūritā bhavati iti nyāyā |
T02n2963u_001:109: taduktaṁ- prajñāpāramitāyām- “evameva subhūte mahāyānaṁ mahāyānamiti“ ( aṣṭasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitā,
T02n2963u_001:113: pṛ0 385 - 391 yathā kāyasyāntaṁ nopalabhyate madhyaṁ nopalabhyate,
T02n2963u_001:119: mahāyānañca prajñāpāramitāsvarūpā prajñāpāramitāṁ hi śruticintā- bhāvanāyāḥ pāramitā gateti |
T02n2963u_001:120: prajñāpāramitā dharmadhātusvarūpā tasyā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarva pāramitāḥ paripuritā bhavanti |
